ygData.messageBody:
I insisted on a cleric... can't remember who wanted a bard :)

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean O'Brien [mailto:sobrien@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 12:31 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [[EQ-Monks] Digest Number 83]


From: "Sean O'Brien" <sobrien@...>

> ROFL, you'll never survive in Mistmoore, or lguk without a cleric or 2
> shamans/druids. Clerics are ESSENTIAL to groups, because w/o them the two
> other priests must save a lot of mana for healing.. This isn't as true at
> lower lvls, but it is so very true at upper levels. All groups NEED a
> cleric at upper levels..

Not to mention if there are deaths...... Res line of spells.
And I don't think any class gets healing better then Greater heal except
cleric... Superior healing, complete heal, word of healing/health.
